General.description: Methanobrevibacter smithii B181 is an anaerobe, mesophilic prokaryote that was isolated from human faeces.

strain history.history: <- T. L. Miller, New York State Department of Health, Albany, New York, USA; B181 <- T. L. Miller {1981}
